name: Booty Hunters in Space
description:
My entry for the Kenney Jam 2019 theme "Unlikely Combinations"

Booty Hunters in Space, has you playing as Space Pirates that must avoid asteroids and aliens to collect Space Booty!

How to play:

Use mouse to fly your pirate ship in space

Left Mouse button fires your pirate space cannons

Esc - Pause Game

Objectives:

Avoid aliens and asteroids

Collect Treasure Chest to gain life

Collect Cannon Balls to increase firepower

Level Timer is small ship on right side of screen

Try to get as many 3 star bonuses as you can

Games assets used:

Game Template:
Asteroid Belt Project - Allebi

Music:
Captain Scurvvy - Incompetech / Kevin MacLeod
Alpha Dance / Sad Town - Kenney Game Assets #1

Font:
Kenney Space - Kenney Game Assets #3

3D Art:
3D Pirate Kit - Kenney Game Assets #3

2D Art:
Pirate Pack - Kenney Game Assets #2

Sound FX:
Laser 2 / Coin 5 / explosion 1 / explosion 2 - Kenney Game Assets #2 / Retro Sounds

GUI:
Puzzle Assets 2 - Kenney Game Assets #1

Background:
Space Shooter Assets (Background) - Kenney Game Assets #1

Obstacles (asteroids / aliens):
3D Space Kit - Kenney Game Assets #3

In-Game Screenshots:
GameJam Toolkit - Julien Foucher

Thanks for Playing!
